blocks.title: Why Get a Taxi Website?
blocks.subtitle: More customers, profit & time savings
blocks.text:
A professional taxi website offers numerous advantages for both starting and established taxi companies. First of all, it immediately radiates professionalism and trust, making potential customers more inclined to book a ride or get in touch. A strategically designed taxi website improves your visibility in search engines like Google. It also allows you to clearly communicate your unique services and be available to customers 24/7, without you having to be available yourself. Moreover, a targeted taxi website helps automate important processes such as online reservations, trip calculations and customer communication, which saves you considerable time and money in the long run.

Are you looking for a professional to build a professional taxi website? Then you've come to the right place. Understand that a good taxi website is not just about higher positions in Google, but especially about optimizing your business processes and increasing your bookings. Do you have a specific idea or concept that can strengthen your taxi company? Or are you looking for expert advice on how to grow your taxi services digitally? Let's have a conversation and discover which digital solution fits your taxi company perfectly! Or just call me directly!

content.text: More than 80% of customers search online for local services before making a choice. Without a professional website, your taxi company misses valuable bookings to competitors who are visible online.

items: Increase your online visibility in Google
Generate more direct bookings without commissions
Reach customers 24/7, even outside office hours
Compete effectively with large taxi apps

blocks.title: Why All-In-One Package?
blocks.subtitle: No separate systems, but one complete taxi package
blocks.text:
An all-in-one package for your taxi company is very beneficial because it provides a complete total solution. You get a professional website with free lifetime hosting and maintenance. That means: no more invoices for hosting, domain name or email. All administration and invoices regarding those matters are handled by me. You pay just €79 per month and enjoy peace of mind, so you can fully focus on your business. Check the homepage with prices for more information.

There is also a premium package for €99 per month with a booking system. Visitors can book a ride on your website between two addresses (or more, if there are stops). The application automatically suggests the route and calculates the number of kilometers and the price. This saves you time and reduces administrative burden.

Thanks to this integration, routes are automatically suggested and you don't have to fill in the addresses yourself completely. Prices are excl. VAT.
